languages.text: "Живущему будет даровано причастие страха и страдания, дарованы будут погибание и неизбежность его..."

traits.locale_text: "Все живое захлебнется в страхе, приняв свою неизбежную гибель…"

languages.text: "The living will be granted the communion of fear and suffering, the gift of destruction and its inevitability..."
languages.original_text: "Живущему будет даровано причастие страха и страдания, дарованы будут погибание и неизбежность его..."

traits.locale_text: "The living will be granted the communion of fear and suffering, destruction and its inevitability will be bestowed..."
"The living will be granted the communion of fear and suffering, destruction and its inevitability will be bestowed..."
"The living will be granted the communion of fear and suffering, the gift of destruction and its inevitability..."
"The living will be granted the communion of fear and suffering, the gift of destruction and its inevitability..."
"The living will be granted the communion of fear and suffering, the gift of destruction and its inevitability..."
"The living will be granted the communion of fear and suffering, the gift of destruction and its inevitability..."

languages.text: «Los vivos recibirán la comunión de la grandeza y el sufrimiento, el don de la inevitable destrucción...».
languages.original_text: "The living will be granted the communion of fear and suffering, the gift of destruction and its inevitability..."

traits.locale_text: «Los vivos recibirán la comunión de la grandeza y el sufrimiento, el don de la inevitable destrucción...».

languages.text: « Les vivants se verront offrir l'expérience de la communion par la peur et la douleur, le don de la destruction et de l'inéluctabilité... »
languages.original_text: "The living will be granted the communion of fear and suffering, the gift of destruction and its inevitability..."

traits.locale_text: « Les vivants se verront offrir l'expérience de la communion par la peur et la douleur, le don de la destruction et de l'inéluctabilité... »

languages.text: 「生者は恐怖と苦しみの共有、破壊とその不可避性の恩恵を与えられる…」
languages.original_text: "The living will be granted the communion of fear and suffering, the gift of destruction and its inevitability..."

traits.locale_text: 「生者は恐怖と苦しみの共有、破壊とその不可避性の恩恵を与えられる…」

languages.text: “生者将得到恐惧与痛苦的共鸣，得到毁灭的赠礼与必定的恩赐……”
languages.original_text: "The living will be granted the communion of fear and suffering, the gift of destruction and its inevitability..."

traits.locale_text: “生者将得到恐惧与痛苦的共鸣，得到毁灭的赠礼与必定的恩赐……”

languages.text: "Den Lebenden wird die Kommunion der Furcht und des Leids gewährt, die Gabe der Zerstörung und ihrer Unausweichlichkeit ..."
languages.original_text: "The living will be granted the communion of fear and suffering, the gift of destruction and its inevitability..."

traits.locale_text: "Den Lebenden wird die Kommunion der Furcht und des Leids gewährt, die Gabe der Zerstörung und ihrer Unausweichlichkeit ..."

languages.text: "Yaşayanlar; onlara ihsan edilen korku ve acıyı paylaşacak, yok oluş armağanını ve onun kaçınılmazlığını..."
languages.original_text: "The living will be granted the communion of fear and suffering, the gift of destruction and its inevitability..."
